channel.title: Help with connecting, ip, port and starting server
channel.description:
Ok i got runserver, compile, and everything to run it but i still cant get in the server when i put my username and pass and ip and port in. I set my ip to hosttheloser.no-ip.org and i think i made my port 5555. I don't know why i cant log in, i have java updated, but im not to sure how to start my server, get my ip in the server to work and also my port to work.
PLEASE help no one else has seemed to help my issue?

item.title: Help with connecting, ip, port and starting server
item.dc:creator: @P3rscape P3rscape
item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

go into server.java and search for:

public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; //43594=default change both 43594 to 5555 if it doesnt go, search for [code]public static int serverlistnerPort = ####

Hope this helped[/code]

Read full topic
